content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase **this pattern is available for free on my blog here https //www 1dogwoof com/adirondack-wrap-crochet-pattern/ the paid pdf is formatted for easy printing and downloading the adirondack wrap uses shapes and colors to create to a long light and flowing wrap that can also be worn as a scarf it s deceptively simple design makes it perfect for on-the-go crocheting watching-tv crocheting and sip-and-stitch crocheting ……………………………………………………………………………… patterns are written in us crochet terminology and is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
